item.title: Ruby downloader for Jamendo
item.description: Also this year I’ll attend the Linux day (a day dedicated to Gnu/LinuxÂ and FLOSS that occurs every year in Italy) organized by my LUG. Guess what I’ll be talking about… ;) While organizing the event somebody proposed to setup a local server with some music released under CC license. He suggested to download some albums from Jamendo (due to network issues we won’t be able to provide direct access to the website).
